issue.title: medium.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://medium.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com) ### Comment > Hello, my medium profile won't open with adguard activated. However, with writing story and clicking profile worked. (If you need gif file, please let me know.) > > Medium team saids it may caused by extensions or ad-blockers, and after turning off AdGuard it worked as usual. > > I think one of recent update (from Medium or AdGuard I don't know exactly) affected to it. > > Thanks Username: `@jhk0530` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fgpaio54tbswkwsogswgkscgo4cosc0lf7r204kyf4.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/lahx09l55rks8wcgc4c4848cscgk4085yp4ce8flk8.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.15.2.1734 release System version: | 15.1.1(24B91) Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid Tracking protection options: | Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies,
Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `시스템 기본설정`
filters: `AdGuard DNS 필터` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | AdBlock (Chrome extension) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?channel=release&product_type=Mac&product_version=2.15.2.1734+release&dns.servers=%EC%8B%9C%EC%8A%A4%ED%85%9C+%EA%B8%B0%EB%B3%B8%EC%84%A4%EC%A0%95&url=http%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com)
